Title: Harukanaru Toki no Naka de 3: Owarinaki Unmei
Description: ["The war between the Heike clan and the Genji clan continues. This time, Nozomi has to fight a powerful supernatural enemy and make a choice: protect her friends and stay by Kurou's side, or choose her first love, Masaomi, which is the leader of the Heike, and her enemy. "]
Related: ['Prequel: Harukanaru Toki no Naka de 3: Kurenai no Tsuki']
Characters: ['Kasuga, Nozomi', 'Arikawa, Masaomi', 'Minamoto no Kurou, Yoshitsune', 'Hakuryu', 'Musashibou, Benkei', 'Kajiwara, Kagetoki', 'Ridvan', 'Arikawa, Yuzuru', 'Taira no, Atsumori', 'Hinoe']
